## Feature Type

- [ ] New plugin idea
- [ ] Enhancement to existing plugin
- [ ] Marketplace improvement
- [ ] Documentation improvement
- [ ] Other

## Description

Clear and concise description of the feature or plugin idea.

## Problem it Solves

What problem does this solve? What use case does it address?

## Proposed Solution

How would this feature work? What would the user experience be?

## Component Types Needed

If this is a plugin idea:

- [ ] Commands
- [ ] Agents
- [ ] Hooks
- [ ] Skills
- [ ] MCP Servers

## Example Usage

Show an example of how this would be used:

```bash
/plugin-name:command-name
```

## Additional Context

Any other context, mockups, or examples that would be helpful.

## Would you like to implement this?

- [ ] Yes, I'd like to implement this myself
- [ ] I'm suggesting this for someone else to implement
- [ ] I can help but would need guidance
